animeTitle: Leonardo Hakase to Kirin-mura no Nakama-tachi (TV)
animeDescription: A collaboration between Japan Toys"R"Us and DLE. These episodes followed Dr. Leonardo from the Eagle Talon franchise; and two Giraffe brothers, relatives of the original Geoffrey the Giraffe.This TV season was created due to the popularity of the web episodes.
